headline: 5 Must-Read Analyst Questions From Axon’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Axon’s third quarter was marked by robust revenue growth and a negative market reaction, with shares falling significantly after results. Management attributed the top-line momentum to strong demand across software, services, and connected devices, driven by adoption of new AI-powered offerings and deeper customer relationships. CEO Patrick Smith emphasized the rapid uptake of Prepared and Carbyne, highlighting their immediate impact on 911 call center efficiency, while CFO Brittany Bagley point
